name: SolarBlack Early Access for Oculus Quest/Quest 2
name_original: SolarBlack Early Access for Oculus Quest/Quest 2
description:
SolarBlack is a non-stop action-rhythm game that takes you into new spheres!

You will immerse yourself in fantastic worlds, breathe the thin air of the stratosphere and catapult yourself into new galaxies.

The music penetrates each atom of the game – makes it tremble and pulsate with energy. The player can feel every contact with the world up close.

Experience the immersion as you strike back Spherombs from their conquered territory as hard as possible in the rhythm of the modern soundtrack.

Featuring an intuitive tutorial experience for first time players which introduces the gameplay elements (Spherombs, Shooters, Runners, Obstacles) and the rules of the game. This Demo includes two complete Worlds and achievements to unlock.

Step into the world of SolarBlack!

Fully localized in: Chinese, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish.

Join our community and let us know how you like it!
